pages.text: Like other modifications that have tools, you can use the $(l:pedestals:tools/upgradetool)Upgrade Tool$() in the offhand when extracting Upgrades from the pedestal.

pages.title: Upgrades (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting upgrades, they will be placed on the four sides of the pedestal. $(br) Inserting Upgrades can be done with items in the Offhand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one Upgrade from your Offhand, placing it in the pedestal.

pages.title: Upgrades (Extracting)
pages.text: When extracting upgrades, put any Upgrade or the $(l:pedestals:tools/upgradetool)Upgrade Tool$() in the Offhand, then Left Click. This will remove the currently inserted Upgrade from the pedestal.

pages.title: Upgrade (Pedestal Info)
pages.text: When right clicking the $(l:pedestals:tools/upgradetool)Upgrade Tool$() on the pedestal, your chat will display some info about the currently insert upgrade.
